summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, totaling $33.22, with a due date for payment by December 16, 2003.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx, indicating his use of their services.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
